application_details: El Ocla was physically present for 996 days instead of the required 1095 but had established a life in Canada as a tenured professor
decision_reasoning: citizenship judge erred by strictly applying the physical presence test for residency to the exclusion of the qualitative residency test
result_of_case: The appeal was allowed, and El Ocla's case will be reconsidered by a different citizenship judge using the correct legal test
conclusion_outcome: The Federal Court allowed the appeal
